channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:35 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:35 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:21 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:21 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community. Stay tuned for further reports. #Покровська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:13 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:13 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!

item.title: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
